UFW

	
	
	
GUFW

		apt install gufw

	
Status

		ufw status verbose numbered
		
			ufw delete {} --force


	
block everything

		ufw default deny outgoing
		ufw default deny incoming

	
allow

		
everything

			ufw default allow outgoing
			ufw default allow incoming
	
		
address access

			ufw allow out to ecosia.com port 443/tcp
			
			
		
port access

			ufw allow out 80/tcp
			ufw allow out 443/tcp
		

	
Delete All Rules

		
		ufw reset --force
